briefdescription.para: This API reads the data from the given register continuously.
This API is used to get the bandwidth of the sensor in the register 0x10 bit from 0 to 4.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of bandwidth
bw_u8
result
0x08
BMA2x2_BW_7_81HZ
0x09
BMA2x2_BW_15_63HZ
0x0A
BMA2x2_BW_31_25HZ
0x0B
BMA2x2_BW_62_50HZ
0x0C
BMA2x2_BW_125HZ
0x0D
BMA2x2_BW_250HZ
0x0E
BMA2x2_BW_500HZ
0x0F
BMA2x2_BW_1000HZ

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the status of fast offset compensation(cal_rdy) in the register 0x36 bit 4(Read Only Possible)
This API is used to get the duration of Low, High, Slope and slow no motion interrupts in the registers.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of duration select
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_LOW_DURN
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_HIGH_DURN
2
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOPE_DURN
3
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN

simplesect.para:
:
Duration
result
BMA2x2_ACCEL_LOW_DURN
Low-g interrupt trigger
-
delay according to([durn_u8 +1]*2)ms
-
range from 2ms to 512ms. default is 20ms
BMA2x2_ACCEL_HIGH_DURN
high-g interrupt trigger
-
delay according to([durn_u8 +1]*2)ms
-
range from 2ms to 512ms. default is 32ms
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOPE_DURN
slope interrupt trigger
-
if[durn_u8<1:0>+1] consecutive data points
-
are above the slope interrupt threshold
SLO_NO_MOT_DURN
Refer data sheet for clear information

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo data in the register 0x3F bit 0 to 7.
This API is used to get the axis enable of fifo data select in the register 0x3E bit 0 and 1.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of FIFO axis data select
fifo_data_select_u8
result
0x00
XYZ
0x01
Y
0x02
X
0x03
Z

briefdescription.para: This API read fifo frame count from location 0Eh bit position 0 to 6.

parameterdescription.para: : The status of fifo frame count

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the status of fifo (fifo_mode) in the register 0x3E bit 6 and 7.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of fifo mode
fifo_mode_u8
result
0x00
BYPASS
0x01
FIFO
0x02
STREAM
0x03
RESERVED

briefdescription.para: This API read fifo overrun from location 0Eh bit position 7.
This API reads fifo overrun and fifo frame counter status register byte from location 0Eh.

parameterdescription.para: : The status of fifo overrun and frame counter

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo water mark level trigger in the register 0x30 bit from 0 to 5.

parameterdescription.para: The value of fifo watermark trigger level

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt enable of flat hold time(flat_hold_time) in the register 0x2F bit 4 and 5.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of flat hold time
flat_hold_time_u8
result
0x00
0ms
0x01
512ms
0x02
1024ms
0x03
2048ms

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt enable of flat hysteresis("flat_hy) in the register 0x2F bit 0 to 2.
This API is used to get high bandwidth in the register 0x13 bit 7.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of high bandwidth
high_bw_u8
result
0
Unfiltered High Bandwidth
1
Filtered Low Bandwidth

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the i2c watch dog timer period and I2C interface mode is selected in the register 0x34 bit 1 and 2.

parameterdescription.para:
The i2c option selection
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_I2C_SELECT
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_I2C_ENABLE

watch dog timer period and I2C interface mode is selected
BMA2x2_ACCEL_I2C_SELECT
result
0x00
Disable the watchdog at SDI pin
0x01
Enable watchdog
BMA2x2_I2C_ENABLE
result
0x00
1ms
0x01
50ms

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo full interrupt1 in the register 0x1A bit 2.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of fifo full interrupt enable
intr1_fifo_full_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo watermark interrupt1 data in the register 0x1A bit 1.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of interrupt1 FIFO watermark enable
intr1_fifo_wm_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo full interrupt2 in the register 0x1A bit 5.

parameterdescription.para:
: Thee vale of fifo full enable
intr2_fifo_full_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the fifo watermark interrupt2 data in the register 0x1A bit 6.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of interrupt1 FIFO watermark enable
intr2_fifo_wm_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt enable of double tap interrupt in the register 0x19 and 0x1B.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of double tap selection
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_INTR1_DOUBLE_TAP
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_INTR2_DOUBLE_TAP

The double tap interrupt enable value
intr_double_tap_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get interrupt enable bits of the sensor in the registers 0x16 and 0x17.

simplesect.para: It reads the flat enable, orient enable,
single tap enable, double tap enable
slope-x enable, slope-y enable, slope-z enable,
fifo full enable, data enable, low-g enable,

parameterdescription.para:
The value of interrupts
intr_type_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_LOW_G_INTR
1
BMA2x2_HIGH_G_X_INTR
2
BMA2x2_HIGH_G_Y_INTR
3
BMA2x2_HIGH_G_Z_INTR
4
BMA2x2_DATA_ENABLE
5
SLOPE_X_INTR
6
SLOPE_Y_INTR
7
SLOPE_Z_INTR
8
SINGLE_TAP_INTR
9
SINGLE_TAP_INTR
10
ORIENT_INT
11
FLAT_INT

: The value of interrupts enable
value_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt fifo full enable interrupt status in the register 0x17 bit 5.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of fifo full interrupt enable
fifo_full_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt fifo watermark enable interrupt status in the register 0x17 bit 6.

parameterdescription.para:
: the value FIFO Water Mark
fifo_wm_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API read interrupt status of flat, orient, single tap, double tap, slow no motion, slope, highg and lowg from location 09h.
This API read tap-sign, tap-first-xyz slope-sign, slope-first-xyz status register byte from location 0Bh.

parameterdescription.para: : The status of tap and slope

BMA2x2_LATCH_DURN_8S

0x08
BMA2x2_LATCH_DURN_NON_LATCH1
0x09
BMA2x2_LATCH_DURN_250US

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get low_g mode in the registers 0x24 bit 2.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of Low_G mode
low_g_mode_u8
g-result
0x00
LOW_G_SINGLE_AXIS_MODE
0x01
LOW_G_SUMMING_MODE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the low high hysteresis in the registers 0x24.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of hysteresis selection
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_LOW_G_HYST
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_HIGH_G_HYST

simplesect.para: Hysteresis of low-g interrupt according to (hyst_u8 * 125)mg

High hysteresis depends on the accel range selection
g-range
High Hysteresis
2g
(thres_u8 * 125) mg
4g
(thres_u8 * 250) mg
8g
(thres_u8 * 500) mg
16g
(thres_u8 * 1000) mg

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt status of new data in the register 0x19.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of new data interrupt select
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_INTR1_NEWDATA
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_INTR2_NEWDATA

The new data interrupt enable value
intr_newdata_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the nvm program mode(nvm_prog_mode)in the register 0x33 bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of nvm program mode
nvmprog_mode_u8
result
0x00
Disable program mode
0x01
Enable program mode

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the nvm program ready in the register bit 2.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of nvm program ready
nvprog_ready_u8
result
0x00
nvm write/update operation is in progress
0x01
nvm is ready to accept a new write

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the nvm program ready in the register bit 2.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of nvm program ready
nvprog_remain_u8
result
0x00
nvm write/update operation is in progress
0x01
nvm is ready to accept a new write

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the status of offset (offset_x, offset_y and offset_z) in the registers 0x38,0x39 and 0x3A.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of offset selection
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_X_AXIS
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_Y_AXIS
2
BMA2x2_ACCEL_Z_AXIS

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the status of offset target axis(offset_target_x, offset_target_y and offset_target_z) and cut_off in the register 0x37.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of offset axis selection
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_CUT_OFF
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_OFFSET_TRIGGER_X
2
BMA2x2_ACCEL_OFFSET_TRIGGER_Y
2
BMA2x2_ACCEL_OFFSET_TRIGGER_Z

The offset target value
CUT_OFF
result
0
1Hz
1
10Hz

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the orient block in the register 0x2C bit 2 and 3.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of orient block
orient_mode_u8
result
0x00
no blocking
0x01
theta blocking or
| acceleration slope in any axis > 1.5g 0x02 | theta blocking or | acceleration slope in any axis > 0.2g | acceleration in any axis > 1.5g 0x03 | theta blocking or | acceleration slope in any axis > 0.4g | acceleration in any axis > 1.5g | value of orient is not stable for at lease 100ms

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the interrupt enable of orient ud_enable in the register 0x2D bit 6.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of orient ud_enable
orient_enable_u8
result
0x00
Generates Interrupt
0x01
Do not generate interrupt

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the orient hysteresis in the register 0x2C bit 4 to 6.
This API is used to get the orient mode in the register 0x2C bit 0 and 1.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of orient mode
orient_mode_u8
result
0x00
symmetrical
0x01
high asymmetrical
0x02
low asymmetrical
0x03
symmetrical

BMA2x2_MODE_DEEP_SUSPEND

0x00
BMA2x2_MODE_LOWPOWER2
4
0x02
0x01
BMA2x2_MODE_STANDBY

0x04
0x00

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the sleep timer mode in the register 0x12 bit 5.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of sleep timer mode
sleep_timer_u8
result
0

1

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the tap threshold in the register 0x2B bit from 0 to 4.

simplesect.para:
Tap threshold of single and double tap corresponding to accel range
range
Tap threshold
2g
(tap_thres_u8 * 62.5)mg
4g
(tap_thres_u8 * 125)mg
8g
(tap_thres_u8 * 250)mg
16g
(tap_thres_u8 * 500)mg

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the theta value of orient and flat interrupts.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of theta selection
channel_u8
result
0x00
BMA2x2_ACCEL_ORIENT_THETA
0x01
BMA2x2_ACCEL_FLAT_THETA

simplesect.para: FLAT_THETA : Defines a blocking angle between 0 deg to 44.8 deg
ORIENT_THETA : Defines threshold for detection of flat position in range from 0 deg to 44.8 deg

briefdescription.para: This function is used for initialize bus read and bus write functions assign the chip id and device address chip id is read in the register 0x00 bit from 0 to 7.

simplesect.para: While changing the parameter of the bma2x2_t consider the following point: Changing the reference value of the parameter will changes the local copy or local reference make sure your changes will not affect the reference value of the parameter (Better case don't change the reference value of the parameter)

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the status of fast offset compensation(cal_rdy) in the register 0x36 bit 4(Read Only Possible)
This API is used to set the duration of Low, High, Slope and slow no motion interrupts in the registers.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of duration select
channel_u8
result
0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_LOW_DURN
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_HIGH_DURN
2
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOPE_DURN
3
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN

simplesect.para:
:
Duration
result
BMA2x2_ACCEL_LOW_DURN
Low-g interrupt trigger
-
delay according to([durn_u8 +1]*2)ms
-
range from 2ms to 512ms. default is 20ms
BMA2x2_ACCEL_HIGH_DURN
high-g interrupt trigger
-
delay according to([durn_u8 +1]*2)ms
-
range from 2ms to 512ms. default is 32ms
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SLOPE_DURN
slope interrupt trigger
-
if[durn_u8<1:0>+1] consecutive data points
-
are above the slope interrupt threshold
SLO_NO_MOT_DURN
Refer data sheet for clear information

0
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SOURCE_LOW_G
1
BMA2x2_ACCEL_SOURCE_HIGH_G

The source status enable value
intr_source_u8
result
0x00
INTR_DISABLE
0x01
INTR_ENABLE

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the enable status of spi3 in the register 0x34 bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of SPI 3 or 4 wire enable
spi3_u8
result
0x00
spi4
0x01
spi3

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the tap duration in the register 0x2A bit form 0 to 2.

0x01

0x03
TAP_DURN_200_MS
0x04
TAP_DURN_250_MS
0x05
TAP_DURN_375_MS
0x06
TAP_DURN_500_MS
0x07
TAP_DURN_700_MS

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the tap quiet in the register 0x2A bit 7.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of tap quiet
tap_quiet_u8
result
0x00
TAP_QUIET_30_MS
0x01
TAP_QUIET_20_MS

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the tap sample in the register 0x2B bit 6 and 7.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of tap sample
tap_sample_u8
result
0x00
2 samples
0x01
4 samples
0x02
8 samples
0x03
16 samples

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the tap threshold in the register 0x2B bit from 0 to 4.

Tap threshold of single and double tap corresponding to accel range
range
Tap threshold
2g

4g

8g

16g

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the theta value of orient and flat interrupts.

parameterdescription.para:
The value of theta selection
channel_u8
result
0x00
BMA2x2_ACCEL_ORIENT_THETA
0x01
BMA2x2_ACCEL_FLAT_THETA

simplesect.para: FLAT_THETA : Defines a blocking angle between 0 deg to 44.8 deg
ORIENT_THETA : Defines threshold for detection of flat position in range from 0 deg to 44.8 deg

briefdescription.para: This function is used for the soft reset The soft reset register will be written with 0xB6 in the register 0x14.

inbodydescription.para: To reset the sensor 0xB6 value_u8 will be written

briefdescription.para: This API is used to update the register values.
This API gives data to the given register and the data is written in the corresponding register address.
